content.query:
USE DBDLUofUIS6480
GO

-- CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL WorkspaceIdentity WITH IDENTITY = 'Managed Identity'
-- GO

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE DataLakeSilverAll
WITH ( LOCATION = 'sa6480dldwhndev001.blob.core.windows.net/fsuofuis6480dldw001/Silver'
, CREDENTIAL= [WorkspaceIdentity]
)
GO
CREATE SCHEMA Silver
GO
CREATE LOGIN metabase004 WITH PASSWORD = 'PassGreen87632*'
GO
CREATE USER metabase004 FROM LOGIN metabase004
GO
GRANT REFERENCES ON DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL::WorkspaceIdentity TO [metabase004]
GO
GRANT SELECT ON SCHEMA::Silver TO [metabase004]
GO
DENY ADMINISTER DATABASE BULK OPERATIONS TO [metabase004]
GO
DROP VIEW [Silver].[UofUIS6480InstructorDVDRentalFilm]
GO

CREATE VIEW [Silver].[UofUIS6480InstructorDVDRentalFilm] AS
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'UofU/IS6480/Instructor/DVDRental/Film/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'DataLakeSilverAll',
        FORMAT = 'delta'
    ) AS [result]
GO

SELECT * FROM [Silver].[UofUIS6480InstructorDVDRentalFilm]
GO
DROP VIEW [Silver].[UofUIS6480InstructorDVDRentalPayment]
GO
CREATE VIEW [Silver].[UofUIS6480InstructorDVDRentalPayment] AS
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'UofU/IS6480/Instructor/DVDRental/Payment/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'DataLakeSilverAll',
        FORMAT = 'delta'
    ) AS [result]
GO
SELECT * FROM [Silver].[UofUIS6480InstructorDVDRentalPayment]
GO
